thread.title: Re: SO tolerant: SJWs brutally attack Joy Villa on Twitter for daring to wear #MAGA dress to Grammys

author: Daemon Rogue Elf
title: Re: SO tolerant: SJWs brutally attack Joy Villa on Twitter for daring to wear #MAGA dress to Grammys
text:
SO tolerant: SJWs brutally attack Joy Villa on Twitter for daring to wear #MAGA dress to Grammys Posted at 10:15 am on February 13, 2017 by Sam J. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Meryl Streep could learn a thing or two from Joy Villa. Go big, or go home. You can either stand for what you believe or fall for what you don't. ‚Ä¶ https://t.co/PYArl1BnI6 pic.twitter.com/msBfZnCPYV 
‚Äî Joy Villa (@Joy_Villa) February 13, 2017 
As Twitchy reported, the lovely Joy Villa wore a ‚ÄúMake America Great Again‚Äù dress to the Grammys and of course it caused a big ol‚Äô stir. CeeLo Green covered himself head to toe in gold and even he didn‚Äôt get more notice than Villa did. 
And of course since she dared to be different from the typical celebrity elites and show her patriotism, the Left and SJWs came out of the woodwork to attack her on Twitter. We couldn‚Äôt include most of them because they were just that foul but go ahead and take a look at their ‚Äútolerance‚Äù: @Joy_Villa So you're for fascism. Good to know. You know you'll be one of the first they throw in the camps, right? pic.twitter.com/05scqZoQOf 
‚Äî Renko Styranka üá®üá¶ (@RenkoStyranka) February 13, 2017 
These people. 
‚Äî Salem Elizabeth (@SalemElizabethQ) February 13, 2017 
Blah blah blah blah blah. Change the record, lady. @SalemElizabethQ @Joy_Villa she stood alone and made a huge statement. All women don't have to think alike, that's what makes America great 
‚Äî Cher Mac (@ScentSister) February 13, 2017 Trending
